nodes.text: Corellia Space Sector IV-3121 was an area of space in the Corellian system.
1.5 years ABY a freighter attacked by Black Sun pirates in sector OC-3101 fled to sector IV-3121, where he was rescued by a CorSec pilot that escorted the freighter to safety.

This sector is where the third mission for CorSec pilot trainer Sergeant Rhea takes place in Star Wars Galaxies. The name is only mentioned in the mission's title, "Corellia System: Patrol Corellia Space Sector IV-3121".
